easyconduite.ui

Class IconButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • easyconduite.ui.IconButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class IconButton
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    This class creates a clickable image with a icon.
    Author:
    Antony Fons

    • Constructor Detail

      • IconButton

        public IconButton(String pathNameOfIcon)
        Constructor.
        Construct an IconButton, wich extends an ImageView. The size of icon is 30,30 px.
        Parameters:
        pathNameOfIcon - The path and name of the icon, loaded by ResourceAsStream (from classpath).
